title: El Ocotal Forest Park
description: Spread across 122 hectares, this pine-covered park is a haven for hikers, cyclists, and nature lovers. With its fresh mountain air, picnic areas, and scenic trails, El Ocotal is ideal for outdoor adventures and peaceful retreats.

title: Centro Cultural Isidro Fabela
description: Located in the former home of a prominent Mexican intellectual, this cultural center features exhibitions, a library, and personal artifacts. It’s a space that celebrates literature, history, and the legacy of Atlacomulco’s most influential figures.

title: Atlacomulco Artisan Market
description: A colorful hub of local creativity, this market showcases handcrafted textiles, pottery, and regional delicacies. It’s the perfect place to discover unique souvenirs and connect with the town’s artistic soul.
